question: According to the study "World Leaders on Facebook" who is the most 'liked' world leader on Facebook?
explanation: According to the study "World Leaders on Facebook" released by Burson Cohn & Wolfe PM Modi is the most 'liked' world leader on Facebook. With 43.2 million likes, Prime Minister Modi is almost double of USA President Donald Trump, who has 23.1 Million likes. Modi also has the second highest number of interactions and interaction rate behind Trump.
